item.title: As Quickly as Gardens Grow
item.description: “She’s been sitting there for the past hour,” whispered the woman to the other. The two women stood there, in the living room, studying the young woman in the armchair. She was stone-still, and if it hadn’t been for the slightest in-and-out of her breathing, the women would have assumed she was dead. “You told her the news?” the other woman whispered anxiously. Her companion nodded gravely. “This is how she took it.
